cas:Sofa.sofaString:
Decision of the EEA Joint CommitteeNo 22/2002of 1 March 2002amending Annex XXI ( Statistics ) to the EEA AgreementTHE EEA JOINT COMMITTEE , Having regard to the Agreement on the European Economic Area , as amended by the Protocol adjusting the Agreement on the European Economic Area , hereinafter referred to as " the Agreement " , and in particular Article 98 thereof , Whereas:(1 ) Annex XXI to the Agreement was amended by Decision of the EEA Joint Committee No 86/2001 of 19 June 2001(1).(2 ) Commission Regulation ( EC ) No 995/2001 of 22 May 2001 implementing Regulation ( EC ) No 2516/2000 of the European Parliament and of the Council modifying the common principles of the European system of national and regional accounts in the Community ( ESA 95 ) as concerns taxes and social contributions(2 ) is to be incorporated into the Agreement , HAS DECIDED AS FOLLOWS : Article 1The following indent shall be added in point 19d ( Council Regulation ( EC ) No 2223/96 ) of Annex XXI to the Agreement : " - 32001 R 0995 : Commission Regulation ( EC ) No 995/2001 of 22 May 2001 ( OJ L 139 , 23.5.2001 , p. 3)."Article 2The texts of Regulation ( EC ) No 995/2001 in the Icelandic and Norwegian languages , to be published in the EEA Supplement of the Official Journal of the European Communities , shall be authentic . Article 3This Decision shall enter into force on 2 March 2002 provided that all the notifications under Article 103(1 ) of the Agreement have been made to the EEA Joint Committee(3).Article 4This Decision shall be published in the EEA Section of , and in the EEA Supplement to , the Official Journal of the European Communities . Done at Brussels , 1 March 2002.For the EEA Joint CommitteeThe PresidentP.

Article 4

This Decision shall be published in the EEA Section of , and in the EEA Supplement to , the Official Journal of the European Communities .
